text:
@PressSec If our Republican Leaders and Trump had not been ignorant & acted responsibly against the #TrumpPandemic COVID-19

Other World Leaders have led their countries to contain the Virus but America has not

America has 4-1/2% of World Population but 26% of Virus Cases

#ReplaceMorons! https://t.co/impn5SE0VA
